name: G-Max Chi Strike
effect: The Fighting-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Knuckle while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. The user and its allies' moves now have High Crit until the end of scene.
description: The user's fighting spirits shouts with power as it attacks from the sky, empowering itself and its allies.
